characterDescription:
Lunu'anaki is the Unkalaki god of travel and mischief.
According to Rock, he is a very powerful god who came from the depths of a Horneater Peaks ocean, or the realm of the gods.
In telling a story of the hot springs atop those Peaks of his homeland, Rock says:

characterDetails.Appearance: Again, according to Rock, he looks like maybe an Alethi, though his skin is lighter. He has a very angular face. He's even handsome, perhaps, with white hair, yet he is a young man.
characterDetails.Notes: It has been confirmed that the Shardpool on the Peaks can connect to Shadesmar - or to another world in the cosmere - due to Azure's account of her arrival on Roshar.
